title: Monk Little Dog
resume: Monk Little Dog is a CG American animated television series created by Sungjae Kim for a channel FX, was premiere on June 16, 2009 and ended on June 11, 2010, the series was aired on Canal+ for a French distribution, the series is in actual rerun.
